monster.name: Ambush Drake
monster.languages: understands Draconic but can't speak it

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The drake has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the drake's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

trait.name: Surprise Attack
entries: If the drake surprises a creature and hits it with an attack during the first round of combat, the target takes an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage from the attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 ({@dice 1d6+1}) piercing damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Azbara is a 6th-level spellcaster that uses Intelligence as his spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). Azbara has the following spells prepared from the wizard spell list:

trait.name: Special Equipment
entries: Azbara has two {@item spell scroll (1st level)|DMG|scrolls} of {@spell mage armor}.

trait.name: Potent Cantrips
entries: When Azbara casts an evocation Cantrips and misses, or the target succeeds on its saving throw, the target still takes half the cantrip's damage but suffers no other effect.

trait.name: Sculpt Spells
entries: When Azbara casts an evocation spell that affects other creatures that he can see, he can choose a number of them equal to 1+the spell's level to succeed on their saving throws against the spell. Those creatures take no damage if they would normally take half damage from the spell.

action.name: Dagger
entries: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or ranged 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 ({@dice 1d4+3}) piercing damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Blagothkus can innately cast the following spells (spell save DC 15), requiring no material components:

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Blagothkus is a 5th-level spellcaster that uses Intelligence as his spellcasting ability (spell save DC 15, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). Blagothkus has the following spells prepared from the wizard spell list:

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: Blagothkus has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Blagothkus attacks twice with his morningstar.

action.name: Morningstar
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 21 ({@dice 3d8+8}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Action Surge (Recharges on a Short or Long Rest)
entries: On his turn, Othelstan can take one additional action.

trait.name: Tiamat's Blessing of Retribution
entries: When Othelstan takes damage that reduces him to 0 hit points, he immediately regains 20 hit points. If he has 20 hit points or fewer at the end of his next turn, he dies.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Othelstan attacks twice with his flail or spear, or makes two ranged attacks with his spears.

action.name: Flail
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 ({@dice 1d8+4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Spear
entries: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft. or ranged 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 7 ({@dice 1d6+4}) piercing damage.

monster.name: Dralmorrer Borngray
monster.languages: Common, Bullywug, Draconic, Elvish, Goblin, Sylvan

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Dralmorrer is a 7th-level spellcaster that uses Intelligence as his spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). Dralmorrer has the following spells prepared from the wizard spell list:

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: Dralmorrer has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put him to sleep.

trait.name: War Magic
entries: When Dralmorrer uses his action to cast a cantrip, he can also take a bonus action to make one weapon attack.

trait.name: Weapon Bond
entries: Provided his longsword is on the same plane Dralmorrer can take a bonus action to teleport it to his hand.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Dralmorrer attacks twice, either with his longsword or dagger.

action.name: Longsword
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 ({@dice 1d8+4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Dagger
entries: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft. or ranged 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 6 ({@dice 1d4+4}) piercing damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Frulam is a 5th-level spellcaster that uses Wisdom as her spellcasting ability (spell save DC 14, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). Frulam has the following spells prepared from the cleric spell list:

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Frulam attacks twice with her halberd.

action.name: Halberd
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: {@hit 5} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 7 ({@dice 1d10+2}) bludgeoning damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Jamna is a 4th-level spellcaster that uses Intelligence as her spellcasting ability (spell save DC 12, {@hit 4} to hit with spell attacks). Jamna has the following spells prepared from the wizard spell list.

trait.name: Cunning Action
entries: Jamna can take a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

trait.name: Gnome Cunning
entries: Jamna has advantage on Intelligence, Wisdom and Charisma saving throws against magic.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Jamna attacks twice with her shortswords.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 ({@dice 1d6+3}) piercing damage, or 9 ({@dice 1d6+3}) plus ({@dice 1d6}) piercing damage if the target is Medium or larger.

trait.name: Action Surge (Recharges on a Short or Long Rest)
entries: On his turn, Langdedrosa can take one additional action.

trait.name: Improved Critical
entries: Langdedrosa's weapon attacks score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Langdedrosa attacks twice, either with his greatsword or spear.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 ({@dice 2d6+4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Spear
entries: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft. or ranged 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 7 ({@dice 1d6+4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Lightning Breath (Recharge 5–6)
entries: Langdedrosa breathes lightning in a 30-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in the line must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 ({@dice 4d10}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Pharblex is a 6th-level spellcaster that uses Wisdom as his spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). Pharblex has the following spells prepared from the druid spell list:

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: Pharblex can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Poison Strike (3/Day)
entries: Once per turn, when Pharblex hits with a melee attack, he can expend a use of this trait to deal an extra 9 ({@dice 2d8}) poison damage.

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: As part of his movement and without a running start, Pharblex can long jump up to 20 feet and high jump up to 10 feet.

trait.name: Swamp Camouflage
entries: Pharblex has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in swampy terrain.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Pharblex attacks twice. Once with his bite and once with his spear.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 ({@dice 1d4+2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Spear
entries: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: {@hit 5} to hit. reach 5 ft. or ranged 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 ({@dice 1d6+2}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Special Equipment
entries: Rezmir has the {@item Black Dragon Mask|hotdq}, {@item Hazirawn|hotdq}, and an {@item insignia of claws|hotdq}.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: Rezmir can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Dark Advantage
entries: Once per turn, Rezmir can deal an extra 10 ({@dice 3d6}) damage when she hits with a weapon attack, provided Rezmir has advantage on the attack roll.

trait.name: Draconic Majesty
entries: While wearing no armor and wearing the Black Dragon Mask, Rezmir adds her Charisma bonus to her AC (included).

trait.name: Immolation
entries: When Rezmir is reduced to 0 hit points, her body disintegrates into a pile of ash.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
entries: If Rezmir fails a saving throw while wearing the Black Dragon Mask, she can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Greatsword (Hazirawn)
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 ({@dice 2d6+6}) slashing damage plus 7 ({@dice 2d6}) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, it can't regain hit points for 1 minute. The target can make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending this effect early on a success.

action.name: Caustic Bolt
entries: Ranged Spell Attack: {@hit 8} to hit, range 90 ft., one target. Hit: 18 ({@dice 4d8}) acid damage.

action.name: Acid Breath (Recharge 5–6)
entries: Rezmir breathes acid in a 30-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in the line must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 ({@dice 5d8}) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Darkness (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: If she is wearing the Black Dragon Mask, Rezmir can take up to two legendary actions between each of her turns, taking the actions all at once or spreading them over the round. A legendary action can be taken only at the start or end of a turn.

A 15-foot radius of magical darkness extends from a point Rezmir can see within 60 feet of her and spreads around corners. The darkness lasts as long as Rezmir maintains concentration, up to 1 minute. A creature with darkvision can't see through this darkness, and no natural light can illuminate it. If any of the area overlaps with a area of light created by a spell of 2nd level or lower, the spell creating the light is dispelled.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: Rezmir makes one melee attack.

legendary.name: Hide
entries: Rezmir takes the Hide action.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Talis is a 9th-level spellcaster that uses Wisdom as her spellcasting ability (spell save DC 14, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). Talis has the following spells prepared from the cleric spell list:

trait.name: Special Equipment
entries: Talis has {@item scale mail +1|dmg|+1 scale mail} and a {@item wand of winter|hotdq}.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: Talis has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put her to sleep.

trait.name: Winter Strike (3/Day)
entries: Once per turn, when Talis hits with a melee attack, she can expend a use of this trait to deal an extra 9 ({@dice 2d8}) cold damage.

action.name: Spear
entries: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or ranged 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 6 ({@dice 1d6+2}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The troll has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The troll regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the troll takes acid or fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the troll's next turn. The troll dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The troll attacks five times, once with its bite and four times with its claws. If two or more claws hit the same target, the troll rends the target, dealing an extra {@dice 2d6} slashing damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: {@hit +7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: {@hit +7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.
